text:
Varnish Software | Software Engineer | New York City (NYC), NY

Varnish Software is the company behind Varnish Cache, the popular open source caching proxy. Looking for a full time onsite engineer who is comfortable working with Varnish Cache and VCL, C, Linux, HTTP and with client facing interactions. Full benefits offered.

If you are interested, please email: reza AT varnish-software DOT com
